# cmccloudv2_keymanagement_container (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# get keymanagement container by id
data "cmccloudv2_keymanagement_container" "container_1" {  
    container_id = "8a26f333-c1b6-4ebf-9ecf-2b155bfaa37d"
}

# get keymanagement container by name
data "cmccloudv2_keymanagement_container" "container_1" {  
    name = "container-a37d"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `container_id` (String) Id of the container
- `name` (String) Filter KeyManagementContainer by name, match exactly
- `type` (String) Filter KeyManagementContainer by type, match exactly

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String)
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
